text: Dvorane () is a village located in the Kruševac municipality in central Serbia. It is a part of the Rasina District. According to the 2002 census it had a population of 593. ==People== *Peter Novak (born Petar Stojadinovic, November 8, 1929 - November 24, 2004), prominent Serbian-American businessman and inventor. Category:Kruševac Category:Populated places in Rasina District
title: Dvorane
